profile.greeting: Welcome to CeleBot {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to CeleBot where you'll find styles for every occasion.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the features
get_started.help: Do you want to submit a video for an existing order or start a new one?

order.name: Please enter the name for whom you are creating this video preceded by a hash
order.occasion: Is it a birthday or graduation?
order.number: Sure, please write the 4 digit code given to you
order.status: The order is for {{name}}'s {{occasion}}, submit the video to confirm, retype confirmation if you think this is a mistak
order.init: Your order has been initiated forward the message below to your friends

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, let the person who gave you the code know!
